body:
Comment 6: 
Sorry to report there are a few more issues

A bunch are reported in the yacc generated code which I have ignored, but these two are
quite common

pkg/time
/home/dfc/go/src/cmd/6g/ggen.c:599:60: runtime error: left shift of negative value -1
/home/dfc/go/src/libmach/6obj.c:134:20: runtime error: left shift of 3435973836 by 32
places cannot be represented in type 'vlong' (aka 'long long')
pkg/os
/home/dfc/go/src/libmach/6obj.c:134:20: runtime error: left shift of 3435973836 by 32
places cannot be represented in type 'vlong' (aka 'long long')
pkg/reflect
a.y:634:28: runtime error: left shift of 2147483648 by 32 places cannot be represented
in type 'vlong' (aka 'long long')
/home/dfc/go/src/libmach/6obj.c:134:20: runtime error: left shift of 2147483648 by 32
places cannot be represented in type 'vlong' (aka 'long long')
pkg/fmt
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
